meanings.definition: A stringed musical instrument similar to a mandolin.
meanings.sent1: She learned to play the buzukis beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The musician strummed the buzukis at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The buzukis player made everyone dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the buzukis filled the room like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: His fingers danced on the buzukis, creating magical melodies.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'buzuki'.
meanings.sent1: They collected various buzukis from around the world.
meanings.sent2: In Greece, many people own buzukis.
meanings.sent3: The buzukis in the shop looked like a colorful bunch of bananas.
meanings.sent4: The buzzing sound of the buzukis echoed through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the sweet aroma of buzukis.
